name: KoiBoi
description:
Hi everyone, here we present our GameJam Project "Koiboi", a Tower Defense Game with a playable Character. Playing in the role of "Koiboi", you're defending his Home River from the Factory's Trash Minions, who are looking to poison the water and all the creatures within.
For this, place structures and weapons to stop the enemies from reaching the river bend, and if it comes down to it, you may smack them with your fishing hook shurikens.

CONTROLS:

WASD = Movement

Left Click/Mouse = Direction + Throw Shurikens

Structures:
1 = Turret [Shot]
2 = Catapult [One-Shot]
3 = Ground Bump [Slow]
4 = Thorn Bush [Slow Down + Damage]

Number + Mouse R = Structure Placement [In Building Phase before each wave]

PHASES:

1: Building Phase (Place Structures)
2: Enemy Phase
3: Progression/Regression Phase
